entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
